messages.message: It would be great to have one for the Enterprise documentation as well.

Haha, I need an autoresponse for everyone asking about this: it’s in the plan!

You _are_ the first to ask about adding Academy content to the bot, though, @Orlando. Not sure how that would work, since Academy isn’t really geared toward quick answers in the way docs are. Plus all the information in Academy is also in docs. :thinking_face: We _are_ looking at adding some of the Academy guides to docs, so that might be the answer.

In any case, I will think about the Academy piece and see what we can come up with!
